targets.expr:
(100 - cpu_idle{job=~"$job", job!="virtual_hosts", alias=~"$alias", cpu=~"$cpu"})
or
absent(cpu_idle{job=~"$job", job!="virtual_hosts", alias=~"$alias", cpu=~"$cpu"}) * 0

(100 - cpu_idle{job=~"$job", job!="virtual_hosts", alias=~"$alias", cpu=~"$cpu"})
or
absent(cpu_idle{job=~"$job", job!="virtual_hosts", alias=~"$alias", cpu=~"$cpu"}) * 0

# (100 - cpu_idle{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias", cpu=~"$cpu"}) - (cpu_system_load{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias", cpu=~"$cpu"} + cpu_user_load{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias", cpu=~"$cpu"})

(
  (
    (100 - cpu_idle{job=~"$job", job!="virtual_hosts", alias=~"$alias", cpu=~"$cpu"})
    or
    (absent(cpu_idle{job=~"$job", job!="virtual_hosts", alias=~"$alias", cpu=~"$cpu"}) * 0)
  )
  -
  (
    cpu_system_load{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias", cpu=~"$cpu"} +
    cpu_user_load{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias", cpu=~"$cpu"}
  )
)
or
absent(cpu_idle{job=~"$job", job!="virtual_hosts", alias=~"$alias", cpu=~"$cpu"}) * 0

100 * (rate(net_drop_in{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias", interface=~"$interface"}[$__interval]) / 
    on (job, alias, interface)

 (
 rate(net_drop_in{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias", interface=~"$interface"}[$__interval])
 + 
 rate(net_packets_recv{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias", interface=~"$interface"}[$__interval])
 )
 )

100 * (rate(net_drop_out{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias", interface=~"$interface"}[$__interval]) / 
    on (job, alias, interface)

 (
 rate(net_drop_out{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias", interface=~"$interface"}[$__interval])
 + 
 rate(net_packets_sent{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias", interface=~"$interface"}[$__interval])
 )
 )

100 * (rate(net_err_in{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias", interface=~"$interface"}[$__interval]) / 
    on (job, alias, interface)

 (
 rate(net_err_in{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias", interface=~"$interface"}[$__interval])
 + 
 rate(net_packets_recv{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias", interface=~"$interface"}[$__interval])
 )
 )

100 * (rate(net_err_out{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias", interface=~"$interface"}[$__interval]) / 
    on (job, alias, interface)

 (
 rate(net_err_out{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias", interface=~"$interface"}[$__interval])
 + 
 rate(net_packets_sent{job=~"$job", alias=~"$alias", interface=~"$interface"}[$__interval])
 )
 )
